name: RTCIceTransport.getLocalCandidates
description: The RTCIceTransport method getLocalCandidates() returns an array of RTCIceCandidate objects, one for each of the candidates that have been gathered by the local device during the current ICE agent session.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCIceCandidate.getLocalCandidates()' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
